018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.HashSet;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Set;
029import java.util.logging.Level;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand.Command.SET_CURRENT_CPUS;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommandCompleted;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorResult;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
036import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
037
038/**
039 * The Class CpuController.
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
042public class CpuController extends Component {
043
044    private static ObjectMapper mapper;
045    private static JsonNode queryHotpluggableCpus;
046
047    private final QemuMonitor monitor;
048    private Integer desiredCpus;
049
050    /**
051     * Instantiates a new CPU controller.
052     *
053     * @param componentChannel the component channel
054     * @param monitor the monitor
055     */
056    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic")
057    public CpuController(Channel componentChannel, QemuMonitor monitor) {
058        super(componentChannel);
059        if (mapper == null) {
060            mapper = new ObjectMapper();
061            try {
062                queryHotpluggableCpus = mapper.readValue(
063                    "{\"execute\":\"query-hotpluggable-cpus\",\"arguments\":{}}",
064                    JsonNode.class);
065            } catch (IOException e) {
066                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
067                    () -> "Cannot initialize class: " + e.getMessage());
068            }
069        }
070        this.monitor = monitor;
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * On monitor command.
075     *
076     * @param event the event
077     */
078    @Handler
079    public void onMonitorCommand(MonitorCommand event) {
080        if (event.command() != SET_CURRENT_CPUS) {
081            return;
082        }
083        desiredCpus = (Integer) event.arguments()[0];
084        monitor.sendToMonitor(queryHotpluggableCpus);
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * On monitor result.
089     *
090     * @param result the result
091     */
092    @Handler
093    public void onMonitorResult(MonitorResult result) {
094        if (!result.executed()
095            .equals(queryHotpluggableCpus.get("execute").asText())
096            || desiredCpus == null) {
097            return;
098        }
099
100        // Sort
101        List<ObjectNode> used = new ArrayList<>();
102        List<ObjectNode> unused = new ArrayList<>();
103        for (var itr = result.returned().iterator(); itr.hasNext();) {
104            ObjectNode cpu = (ObjectNode) itr.next();
105            if (cpu.has("qom-path")) {
106                used.add(cpu);
107            } else {
108                unused.add(cpu);
109            }
110        }
111
112        // Process
113        int diff = used.size() - desiredCpus;
114        diff = addCpus(used, unused, diff);
115        diff = deleteCpus(used, diff);
116        fire(new MonitorCommandCompleted(SET_CURRENT_CPUS, desiredCpus + diff));
117        desiredCpus = null;
118    }
119
120    private int addCpus(List<ObjectNode> used, List<ObjectNode> unused,
121            int diff) {
122        Set<String> usedIds = new HashSet<>();
123        for (var cpu : used) {
124            String qomPath = cpu.get("qom-path").asText();
125            if (qomPath.startsWith("/machine/peripheral/cpu-")) {
126                usedIds
127                    .add(qomPath.substring(qomPath.lastIndexOf('/') + 1));
128            }
129        }
130        int nextId = 1;
131        while (diff < 0 && !unused.isEmpty()) {
132            ObjectNode cmd = mapper.createObjectNode();
133            cmd.put("execute", "device_add");
134            ObjectNode args = mapper.createObjectNode();
135            cmd.set("arguments", args);
136            args.setAll((ObjectNode) (unused.get(0).get("props").deepCopy()));
137            args.set("driver", unused.get(0).get("type"));
138            String id;
139            do {
140                id = "cpu-" + nextId++;
141            } while (usedIds.contains(id));
142            args.put("id", id);
143            monitor.sendToMonitor(cmd);
144            unused.remove(0);
145            diff += 1;
146        }
147        return diff;
148    }
149
150    private int deleteCpus(List<ObjectNode> used, int diff) {
151        while (diff > 0 && !used.isEmpty()) {
152            ObjectNode cpu = used.remove(0);
153            String qomPath = cpu.get("qom-path").asText();
154            if (!qomPath.startsWith("/machine/peripheral/cpu-")) {
155                continue;
156            }
157            String id = qomPath.substring(qomPath.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
158            ObjectNode cmd = mapper.createObjectNode();
159            cmd.put("execute", "device_del");
160            ObjectNode args = mapper.createObjectNode();
161            cmd.set("arguments", args);
162            args.put("id", id);
163            monitor.sendToMonitor(cmd);
164            diff -= 1;
165        }
166        return diff;
167    }
168}
